content:
本件保存
會員委設建 庫水門 石 SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
SDC - 5390
July 10, 1962
Mr. K. T. Li, Secretary-General Council for United States Aid 118 Hwaining Street Taipei, Taiwan
Sub ject :
GSA Surplus Material
Dear Mr. Li:
It is recommended by MKA that the spare parts as shown in the attached U.S. Surplus catalogue are required by the Shihmen project for construction plant use. We, therefore, request your arrangement with AID/C to allocate these spare parts to Shihmen project on priority basis for meeting our construction requirements. 140.112.213.82
Pertinent documents from Commanding Officer, USNSAT, Taipei are enclosed herewith for your immediate action.
Very truly yours, SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
W.N.Ihm
W. K. Ku Chief Engineer
51.7. 11 13678
V.O.
S.G.
(2)
2 239
CUPA4
Enclosures cc: Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/C (w/encl.) Mr. G. C. Johnson, MKA/T (w/encl.)
$ n
國史饭 Academia Historica
36
143 :unselected:

lines.content: 會員委設建 庫水門 石
It is recommended by MKA that the spare parts as shown
in the attached U.S. Surplus catalogue are required by the Shihmen
project for construction plant use. We, therefore, request your
arrangement with AID/C to allocate these spare parts to Shihmen
project on priority basis for meeting our construction requirements.
Pertinent documents from Commanding Officer, USNSAT, Taipei
are enclosed herewith for your immediate action.
cc: Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/C (w/encl.)

paragraphs.content: 會員委設建 庫水門 石 SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
Mr. K. T. Li, Secretary-General Council for United States Aid 118 Hwaining Street Taipei, Taiwan

It is recommended by MKA that the spare parts as shown in the attached U.S. Surplus catalogue are required by the Shihmen project for construction plant use. We, therefore, request your arrangement with AID/C to allocate these spare parts to Shihmen project on priority basis for meeting our construction requirements. 140.112.213.82
Pertinent documents from Commanding Officer, USNSAT, Taipei are enclosed herewith for your immediate action.
Very truly yours, SHIHMEN DEVELOPMENT COMMISSION
Enclosures cc: Mr. J. B. Carter, AID/C (w/encl.) Mr. G. C. Johnson, MKA/T (w/encl.)
